title: Train Wreck: A Novel
description: What if I told you there is a secret stock market that assigns a dollar value to the life of every man, woman and child?Would you believe it? And more importantly, how much do you think you'd be worth?Nick Buchanan faces that question every day. He works for a nontraditional insurance firm that gambles on the lives of ordinary Americans and cashes in when they die.After one of his clients is murdered, Nick finds himself in the middle of a tangled conspiracy that he must unravel before the killers can claim another victim.
author: Bennett Gavrish
